# sampleTimestamps()

**Instance Method**

Captures and returns a CPU timestamp and a GPU timestamp from the same moment in time.

## Declaration

```swift
func sampleTimestamps() -> (cpu: MTLTimestamp, gpu: MTLTimestamp)
```

## Return Value

A tuple that contains the CPU and GPU timestamps.



## Discussion

For an example of how and when to use corresponding timestamps from the CPU and GPU, see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/converting-gpu-timestamps-into-cpu-time].
title: sampleTimestamps()
